LanguageData.CLB_LivingBomb_Remote.label: Self-detonation device (remote)
LanguageData.CLB_LivingBomb_Remote.description: A small chip implanted in the brain. Causes an explosion upon death. Can be detonated remotely.
LanguageData.CLB_LivingBomb.label: Self-detonation device (not remote)
LanguageData.CLB_LivingBomb.description: A small chip implanted in the brain. Causes an explosion upon death. Can not be detonated remotely.
